name: MoveListToFolder
description:
Move a CRM list to a specified folder.

Use this tool to move a specific list within HubSpot CRM to a desired folder, organizing lists efficiently.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the list you want to move. It should be a valid string representing the list in HubSpot CRM.

value_schema.description: The Id of the list to move.

parameters.name: target_folder_id
parameters.description: The ID of the folder to move the list to. Use '0' for the root folder.

value_schema.description: The Id of folder to move the list to, the root folder is Id 0.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The Id of the list to move.

value_schema.description: The Id of the list to move.

parameters.name: newFolderId
parameters.description: The Id of folder to move the list to, the root folder is Id 0.

value_schema.description: The Id of folder to move the list to, the root folder is Id 0.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
